name: Lakshay Sharma
about: Passionate software engineer skilled in mathematical problem-solving, coding and data analysis. Enthusiastic learner with expertise in VBA, Python, C++, and programming. Proven track record in innovative project contributions. Actively engages in extracurriculars, promoting teamwork, and community growth.

experience.title: SDE II
experience.description: • Developed a KPI validation tool in VBA, slashing product launch preparation time while minimizing errors.• Developed diverse APIs and their Unit Test Cases ensuring seamless integration• Conducted System Integration Testing (SIT) for our product, ensuring thorough test coverage and product quality.
experience.description_html: • Developed a KPI validation tool in VBA, slashing product launch preparation time while minimizing errors.• Developed diverse APIs and their Unit Test Cases ensuring seamless integration• Conducted System Integration Testing (SIT) for our product, ensuring thorough test coverage and product quality. <!---->

experience.title: SDE
experience.description: • Literature analysis on working principles of Diesel Engine. • Built an engine mathematical model with anticipated KPIs.• Studied EO 4GL, UNISIM Design, and C#.
experience.description_html: • Literature analysis on working principles of Diesel Engine. • Built an engine mathematical model with anticipated KPIs.• Studied EO 4GL, UNISIM Design, and C#. <!---->

experience.title: Student Member
experience.description: • Under the aegis of Dean of Students' Affairs, IIT Kharagpur, working with a team of 14 members to organize 6 institute level activities aimed at addressing the prominent student issues related to the quality of on-campus student life.• Precisely administered Student Mentor Program 2019-20 subsuming 1587 UG freshmen and 282 mentors.• Orchestrated a range of workshops and panel discussions aiming at academics, internships, placements, directly impacting 3000+ students, and managed a career mentorship portal "Foresight" which is being actively used by 1000+ students.
experience.description_html: • Under the aegis of Dean of Students' Affairs, IIT Kharagpur, working with a team of 14 members to organize 6 institute level activities aimed at addressing the prominent student issues related to the quality of on-campus student life.• Precisely administered Student Mentor Program 2019-20 subsuming 1587 UG freshmen and 282 mentors.• Orchestrated a range of workshops and panel discussions aiming at academics, internships, placements, directly impacting 3000+ students, and managed a career mentorship portal "Foresight" which is being actively used by 1000+ students.

experience.title: Core Organising Team Member
experience.description: **Spring Fest is the annual Social and Cultural Fest of IIT Kharagpur started in 1960 having a footfall of 50000+ students.• Individually garnered funds amounting to INR 3.78 lakhs through corporate deals and alumni contributions.• As a part of the Core Organising Team of Spring Fest 2020, I worked in all facets of the fest, Events, Media, Design, Sponsorship, and Publicity. I was also in-charge of Informal events during Spring Fest 2020, responsible for the execution of more than 30 events throughout the 2200 acre campus and which saw a participation of more than 5000.• Organized the 61st edition of Spring Fest and was a part of a 26 member team, which saw a participation of 5000+ students and 50000+ footfall from all over India and have an overall budget of 1.5 crores.• Coordinated sponsorship drive in Delhi, Mumbai, and Kolkata raising INR 10 lakhs, a 25% YoY increase compared to the previous year.• Co-led a team of 35 associate members, increasing overall in-house participation by 15% YoY and published 120+ media articles, expanding the outreach of Fest to 650+ colleges. Increased participation from Maharashtra by 20%.• Conducted the Nation Wide Prelims of Shake a Leg (Solo Dance Event), SF Idol (Solo Singing Event) , shuffle(Group Dance), Nukkad, and Two for a Tango (Duet Dance Event) in Jaipur for the first time ever which saw participation from all over Rajasthan.
experience.description_html: **Spring Fest is the annual Social and Cultural Fest of IIT Kharagpur started in 1960 having a footfall of 50000+ students.• Individually garnered funds amounting to INR 3.78 lakhs through corporate deals and alumni contributions.• As a part of the Core Organising Team of Spring Fest 2020, I worked in all facets of the fest, Events, Media, Design, Sponsorship, and Publicity. I was also in-charge of Informal events during Spring Fest 2020, responsible for the execution of more than 30 events throughout the 2200 acre campus and which saw a participation of more than 5000.• Organized the 61st edition of Spring Fest and was a part of a 26 member team, which saw a participation of 5000+ students and 50000+ footfall from all over India and have an overall budget of 1.5 crores.• Coordinated sponsorship drive in Delhi, Mumbai, and Kolkata raising INR 10 lakhs, a 25% YoY increase compared to the previous year.• Co-led a team of 35 associate members, increasing overall in-house participation by 15% YoY and published 120+ media articles, expanding the outreach of Fest to 650+ colleges. Increased participation from Maharashtra by 20%.• Conducted the Nation Wide Prelims of Shake a Leg (Solo Dance Event), SF Idol (Solo Singing Event) , shuffle(Group Dance), Nukkad, and Two for a Tango (Duet Dance Event) in Jaipur for the first time ever which saw participation from all over Rajasthan.
